artview.scripts.standard¶

artview.scripts.standard(DirIn='/Users/guy/software/python/artview/docs/source', filename=None, field=None)[source]¶

The standard artview execution.

It has Menu with ComponentsControl,

2 RadarDisplay,

graphical start for:
  • All plugins
  • RadarDisplay
  • ComponentsControl
